page.title: 19GOING FOR A WALK
page.content: ON SATURDAY ALL OUR FAMILY WENT FOR A WALK. IN MY FAMILY THERE IS MY FATHER, MOTHER, BROTHER AND MYSELF. WE ALSO TOOK OUR DOG. WE FIRST WALKED THROUGH THE HOUSING ESTATE PASSED THE SCHOOL AND DOWN ONTO A LANE WHICH TAKES YOU TO THE RIVER CHURNET.THE PATH IS A VERY OLD ONE WHICH WAS PROBABLY USED BY THE MONKS WHICH LIVED IN THE ABBEY WHICH WAS BUILT BY THE SIDE OF THE RIVER. THE ABBEY WAS PULLED DOWN YEARS AGO AND THERE ARE ONLY ONE OR TWO STONES LEFT TO SEE, WHILE WE WALKED MY DAD TOLD US THE NAMES OF THE FLOWERS AND THE BIRDS WE SAW. SOME OF THE FLOWERS HAD VERY FUNNY NAMES WHICH MY DAD SAID PEOPLE HAD GIVEN TO THEM YEARS AGO. I ENJOY GOING FOR WALKS AND I AM TRYING TO REMEMBER ALL THE NAMES SO I CAN TELL MY CHILDREN
